events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the order with the incorrect item.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I will help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number so we can verify and expedite your refund?
I have attached the photo of the wrong item and included my order number ORD123456 in this message for your review.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and for resolving my issue so efficiently. I appreciate the assistance.
The refund has been approved and processed. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within a few days.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund successfully. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since your refund was completed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service in the future.
